channel.title: Rody's Blog
channel.description: Rody Davis personal blog with all my apps, examples and crazy explorations.

item.title: How to deploy PocketBase to Cloud Run
item.description: **TLDR** Fork this [repo](https://github.com/bscott/pocketbase-litestream) to setup Google Cloud Build and setup environment variables.

item.title: 2D/3D Force Graph with Lit
item.description: In this article we will cover how to create a 2D/3D force graph using [Lit](https://lit.dev).

item.title: How to build a Flutter app on Xcode Cloud
item.description: In this article we are going to go over how to setup [Xcode Cloud](https://developer.apple.com/xcode-cloud/) to build your [Flutter](https://flutter.dev/) application for [TestFlight](https://developer.apple.com/testflight/) and the [AppStore](https://developer.apple.com/app-store/).

item.title: Building a HTML Element Sandbox with Lit
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to create a HTML Element sandbox that can be used to update a live component.

item.title: Building a Master / Detail list with Flutter
item.description: In this article we will go over how to build a master / detail list with Flutter.

item.title: Dynamic Themes with CodeMirror
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to create a a code window that uses [CodeMirror](https://codemirror.net) and apply a dynamic theme with [Material Design](https://material.io).

item.title: Lit and Monaco Editor
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to wrap the [Monaco Editor](https://microsoft.github.io/monaco-editor/) that powers [VSCode](https://code.visualstudio.com/).

item.title: Lit and VSCode Extensions
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to create a VSCode extension.

item.title: Draggable DOM with Lit
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to create a interactive dom with CSS transforms and slots.

item.title: Lit Sheet Music
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to render [musicxml](https://www.musicxml.com/) from a src attribute or inline xml using [opensheetmusicdisplay](https://github.com/opensheetmusicdisplay/opensheetmusicdisplay).

item.title: JSON to HTML Table with Lit
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to create a HTML [Table](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/table) from json url or inline json.

item.title: Building a Rich Text Editor with Lit
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to create a rich text editor.

item.title: Lit and Figma
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it to create a figma plugin.

item.title: Lit and Flutter
item.description: In this article I will go over how to set up a [Lit](https://lit.dev) web component and use it inline in the Flutter widget tree.

item.title: Multi-touch Canvas with Flutter
item.description: If you ever wanted to create a canvas in [Flutter](https://flutter.dev) that needs to be panned in any direction and allow zoom then you also probably tried to create a [MultiGestureRecognizer](https://api.flutter.dev/flutter/gestures/MultiDragGestureRecognizer-class.html) or under a [GestureDetector](https://api.flutter.dev/flutter/widgets/GestureDetector-class.html) added onPanUpdate and onScaleUpdate and received an error because both can not work at the same time. Even if you have to GestureDetectors then you will still find it does not work how you want and one will always win.

item.title: How To Send Push Notifications on Flutter Web (FCM)
item.description: If you are using Firebase then you are probably familiar with Firebase Cloud Messaging. The setup on Flutter web is very different than mobile and other plugins you are probably used to.

item.title: How To Host Your Podcast For Free On Github Pages
item.description: Do you have a story to tell and want to share it with the world but do not know where to start? Are you a developer looking to start a tech podcast? Are you looking to save money for hosting? Well this article is for you!

item.title: Deep Linking for Flutter Web
item.description: In this article I will show you how to have proper URL navigation for your application. Open links to specific pages, protected routes and custom transitions.

item.title: Displaying HTML in Flutter
item.description: Sometimes you have content in HTML that needs to be displayed and interacted with in Flutter.

item.title: Flutter Cheat Sheet — Terminal
item.description: Run Flutter web with SKIA

item.title: Host your Flutter Project as a REST API
item.description: After you build your flutter project you may want to reuse the models and business logic from your lib folder. I will show you how to go about setting up the project to have iOS, Android, Web, Windows, MacOS, Linux and a REST API interface with one project. The REST API can also be deploy to Google Cloud Run for Dart everywhere.

item.title: Using Fastlane in Flutter and CI
item.description: Prerequisites:

item.title: How to build a native cross platform project with Flutter
item.description: Import dart:html and dart:io in the same project!

item.title: Creating Your First Flutter Project
item.description: Flutter is a UI Toolkit from Google allowing you to create expressive and unique experiences unmatched on any platform. You can write your UI once and run it everywhere. Yes everywhere! Web, iOS, Android, Windows, Linux, MacOS, Raspberry PI and much more…

item.title: Automate Flutter App Releases
item.description: **TLDR** You can find the script [here](https://gist.github.com/rodydavis/774b36e32d7efa882cca8dd16da6e74c).

item.title: Building A Piano with Flutter
item.description: **TLDR** The final source [here](https://github.com/rodydavis/flutter_piano/tree/5k) and an online [demo](https://pocketpiano.app).

item.title: Flutter + Fastlane (One Click Beta)
item.description: ## 1. Install Flutter
